DOC.brief_title: Psychological Variables Physiotherapy Treatment Low Back Pain : A Comparison Group Individual Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: 200 patient LBP look physiotherapy treatment 15 clinic Maccabi Healthcare Service Israel recruit . ( 100 competion individual therapy , 100 competion group therapy ) . As part regular routine clinic , patient ask fill LFSQ , questionnaire deal back functional status , level pain fear avoidance physical activity treatment . In present study , patient ask fill LFSQ , 6 month treatment completion . In two week treatment completion , patient interview telephone . The interview focuse sensation help . It include open-ended question 18 close question . The main study variable include : participant ' perception functional status , level pain , level fear avoidance physical activity , patient-therapist bonding , helpful therapeutic impact ( client 's sense help ) .
